entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
